mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, PW, SCHOOL_CD, POSITION_CD, KOR_NM, END_NM, GRADE, BAN, BIRTH_DT, CEL_PHONE_NO, HOM_PHONE_NO, GENDER_CD, EMAIL, INPUT_ID, INPUT_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_ID, PW, SCHOOL_CD, POSITION_CD, KOR_NM, END_NM, GRADE, BAN, BIRTH_DT, CEL_PHONE_NO, HOM_PHONE_NO, GENDER_CD, EMAIL, INPUT_ID, INPUT_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{pw}, #{school_cd}, #{position_cd}, #{kor_nm}, #{end_nm}, #{grade}, #{ban}, #{birth_dt}, #{cel_phone_no}, #{hom_phone_no}, #{gender_cd}, #{email}, #{user_id}, NOW(), #{user_id}, NOW() )
